detaileddescription.para: the data store. Note that this will break if word size = 4; only meaningful on the owning processor

briefdescription.para: maps: a shuffled index to the corresponding molecule's neighbors' indices

detaileddescription.para: contains the data of all molecules required by this processor to execute one epoch. Maps: molecule data_id to set of neighbors (including self: data_id); this is the set of molecules required in one call to fetch_datum by the data reader

briefdescription.para: the buffers that will be passed to data_readers::fetch_datum

detaileddescription.para: the process that "owns" the data, i.e, this is the only process whose m_reader will load data from disk

briefdescription.para: true if this processor "owns" the data

memberdef.argsstring: (int data_id, int tid, std::vector< double > *&buf) override
memberdef.name: get_data_buf

memberdef.argsstring: (const int data_id, const int num_samples_per_frame, const int num_features, double *features)
memberdef.name: fill_in_data

briefdescription.para: fills in m_my_molecules using non-blocking MPI send/recv

detaileddescription.para: returns, in 's,' the set of molecules required for processor 'p' for the next epoch
